name: wednesday night
description:
it's a wednesday night.
you put on your mask and step outside.
you already know where you're headed.

-

a love letter to all the bars & cafes that i couldn't go to during lockdown.

made in bitsy for the jazz bitsy jam.

-

CREDITS:
game by npckc

bitsy directional avatar hack: sean s. leblanc

music references:
pedestrian crossing beeps
gymnopedie no. 1 (satie)

special thanks to my patreon supporters!
